description:
This is a market on if Gamestop stock ($GME) will be available for full trading on the Robinhood app in the US on the resolution date, 12pm EST on February 2nd, 2021. Full trading can be defined as both buying and selling, as well as buying and selling of $GME options. If trading of $GME is halted at this time on the exchange level, the market will not resolve until it resumes trading, at which point Robinhood will be referenced to determine if the resolution criteria have been met. This market will resolve to "Yes" if the market conditions are met on the resolution date, and will resolve to "No" otherwise. This is a community suggested market. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

In response to trader inquiry, limits or thresholds as to the size of a buy/sell order will not impact market resolution so long buying, selling, and options are available in some capacity.

events.title: Will Robinhood allow buying of $GME on February 2nd?
